title: [Sponsor] iMazing 3 Coming Soon: Save 30% and Try Out the Beta Today!
content:
iMazing, the world’s favorite iPhone manager, is nearing release the release of version 3.0, the biggest upgrade in our 15-year history! Gain powerful new capabilities over your Apple Mobile devices with a beautiful new user experience.

Rethought, rewritten, and redesigned from the ground up, Daring Fireball readers are invited to check out the macOS beta of iMazing 3 today.

In addition, save 30% on any personal license for a limited time! All purchases are valid for the macOS and Windows versions of iMazing 2 and iMazing 3, due out later this year.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
